hopobject.name: BBMPEB
hopobject.body: A plug in daughter/base board for both the standard Beagleboard and the xM Beagleboard. The purpose of this board is to provide an easy interface to generic LCD/TFT displays. In addition, to bring out level shifted OMAP SPI and i2c interfaces. There is an onboard Microchip dsPIC30F6014A (tm) processor that communicates with the OMAP via the OMAP's SPI3.0 port.
